column4: well i just downloaded a huge file that took me 3 hours to download and its a .rar file it is asking for a password what should i do?
.rar file asking for a password what should i do?
find the password?   Lots of 'questionable' sites/sources  do that..   some give urls to get the password that lead to xxx/spyware/virus sites so be warey
thanx but i don't need a virus right now
of course thats one reason to use linux. :) its proberly not a problem.. but I would find the contents of that .rar file to be questionable also  -  But its your pc. ;)
well i just downloaded bach the whole collection
we dont know how to crack a rar password.. Not sure its even doable..
check the site ya got th file from and it may mention the password
that was a vague answer.. :) custiomuize in what way?
yes.. thats trivial to set up.. install 'ccsm' and play witht he settings it lets you change.
yeah i have ccsm but i don't know which option enables me to do that
under animations I belive.. compiz has lots of docs online and a support channel as well
i just set mine to be 'random' :) then i get sick of it all and set them to be none.
do u know which one allows me to fold it like the origami paper
i belive its called the airplane effect.. or paperplane..  its rather obvious once ya see its name
fire up ccsm tweak the settings.. try it out.. play with it some more.
ActionParsnip im checking
No idea.  selexct it.. use the apply ior whatever buttion, then try minimizing a window.  You just have to toy with it..
or you are setting it for a close, or other 'event' - I dont use COmpiz much at all.. and when i do i dont use those silly effects.
there is no apply button just a close button but still the damn thing won't work
yeah i think so i thankyou very much for ur help :D ActionParsnip too
